summary.span: 为组件的数据字段属性提供设计时类型转换器。

span.span: Provides a design-time type converter for a component's data field properties.

summary.span: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET (ASP.NET 移动应用和网站)。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是 通常由特性引用的对象 。The class is a object that is typically referenced by the attribute. > [!NOTE] > 通常不会直接访问类型转换器。You typically do not access a type converter directly. 的此实现用于 设计时的数据绑定控件，并使用属性对其进行实例化 。This implementation of is intended for use by a data-bound control at design time, and is instantiated with a on a property.
